intro: Tribulus astrocarpus, commonly known as starburster or desert starburster, is a flowering plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of Africa and the Middle East. It is a member of the Zygophyllaceae family and is characterized by its distinctive star-shaped flowers and spiny leaves. The plant produces small, yellowish-green fruits that contain seeds with a hard coat. It is adapted to survive in harsh, dry environments with minimal water availability. Its botanical features make it an important species in ecological studies of desert flora.
